title: lag spike
body: I have had issues with having awful lag spikes while playing lol although my internet speed is pretty fast. I'm really fed up with it.

replies.body:
Something seems really odd about your download speed, to be honest.  Even if your ping is good, the rate of which you're downloading data is poor and it's really odd that your upload is higher.  Your ping is good, but you're likely going to have bandwidth limitations.  Your bandwidth is so low that you'll probably only be able to do one thing like watch Netflix and that's it.  

You should reach out to your ISP to see what the deal is.   While the strength of how well your network is communicating is just as good as how fast it's getting there.  I hope that helps!
